fields.name: One bottle of beer every week for 12 weeks
fields.description:
Sign someone up to our beer club and they’ll drink one bottle of amazing beer from a small, independent brewery every week for 12, 24 or 48 weeks. Each week they’ll be emailed the story behind the beer and have a chance to join in an online tasting every Thursday at 9pm.

Our beers are from small, independent breweries all over the UK.

How it works:

  1. The recipient gets 12 beers in the post every 12 weeks
  2. All subscribers drink the same beer (just one) every week
  3. Every Thursday, the story behind that week's beer gets emailed out. Beer just tastes better when you know a bit more about it
  4. The recipient gets a chance to enjoy each beer with new friends by joining our live tasting every Thursday at 9pm

A brilliant idea. A sort of beer-tasting club, for less than the price of a heavy night out.

The Guardian

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 12 week subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: Three Recipe Box meals for 2 people
fields.description:
Give the perfect gift with a HelloFresh delivery. Share the joy of cooking with your friends and loved ones and treat them to a HelloFresh delivery for one week. Simply buy a gift subscription and wish them Happy Cooking!

Your recipient will be able to choose between the Classic Box or Veggie Box for this gift.

How it works:

  1. Our chefs create delicious recipes
  2. We fill the recipient's box with fresh ingredients
  3. We deliver a recipe box to him or her, at no extra cost
  4. The recipient cooks amazing meals in his or her own home

With our flexible delivery, the recipient can choose a delivery slot that suits his or her schedule, so there's no need to wait around the house all day. Once a slot has been chosen, we’ll pack a box with all the fresh ingredients from our suppliers & recipe cards needed to cook a balanced, brilliant dinner. Then we'll deliver it straight to their door!

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for 3 meals for 2 people over a week with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 bag coffee subscription
fields.description:
eightpointnine was founded in 2011 by two entrepreneurs who shared an obsession for great coffee. Noticing the growing trend for subscriptions and personalisation, they decided to create the first coffee subscription service, and to this day we are still the only company to offer personalised blends.

Look no further for the perfect! eightpointnine can solve all your present worries with a coffee gift for a friend or family member.

How it works:

  1. The recipient receives a gift voucher for your selected gift coffee subscription
  2. He or she can select the frequency to receive the coffee bags (weekly / fortnightly / monthly)
  3. We deliver premium coffee straight to their door, tailor-made for the recipient's unique taste and style

@eightpointnine I don't know how any other coffee can compete. Each custom blend is unique... really found my own flavor. Love it! Thank you.

@Aaron_Safronoff

At eightpointnine, our roast-masters are amongst the best in the business, with over 20 years experience of developing long-term relationships with coffee growing communities around the world.

We have used this experience to source outstanding beans from 6 countries (Brazil, Colombia, Costa Rica, Guatemala, Kenya and Indonesia-Sumatra).

We use only the finest Arabica beans so all of our coffee can easily be enjoyed as single origins but we believe they come together to create even more outstanding coffee blends.

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 bag coffee subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 month coffee subscription
fields.description:
Explore flavours from around the world with our delicious coffees, beautifully blended teas and rich hot chocolate. All ethically sourced directly from expert smallholder farmers. Because we believe things that are made better, taste better.

This is the perfect gift for those who love coffee and exploring new things. The lucky recipient will receive their speciality coffee each month, handpicked by experts, freshly roasted and delivered through their letterbox.

Our 3, 6 and 12 month plans are gifts that last beyond the day itself, as month by month your loved one will receive their favourite coffee, along with a booklet about the story of the farm it comes from, tasting notes and recommended brewing methods.

How it works:

  1. The recipient receives a gift voucher for your selected gift coffee subscription
  2. They will then be able to claim the code by adding their address and choosing the type of coffee they want to receive
  3. We deliver premium coffee straight to their door

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 6 month coffee subscription
fields.description:
Explore flavours from around the world with our delicious coffees, beautifully blended teas and rich hot chocolate. All ethically sourced directly from expert smallholder farmers. Because we believe things that are made better, taste better.

This is the perfect gift for those who love coffee and exploring new things. The lucky recipient will receive their speciality coffee each month, handpicked by experts, freshly roasted and delivered through their letterbox.

Our 3, 6 and 12 month plans are gifts that last beyond the day itself, as month by month your loved one will receive their favourite coffee, along with a booklet about the story of the farm it comes from, tasting notes and recommended brewing methods.

What they get exactly:

Each month they will receive a slimline box which contains a different 250g bag (20-25 cups) of gourmet coffee chosen by our experts from around the world, a gorgeous booklet explaining the provenance of the coffee and tasting notes, and sometimes a special extra treat that we put in from time to time.

How it works:

  1. The recipient receives a gift voucher for your selected gift coffee subscription
  2. They will then be able to claim the code by adding their address and choosing the type of coffee they want to receive
  3. We deliver premium coffee straight to their door

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 6 month craft beer case subscription
fields.description:
Our founder, craft beer obsessive James Brown discovered his passion for craft beer during an epic road trip from his home in Edinburgh to Faro, on the back of his dad's Harley-Davidson. Stopping at tiny pubs and brewhouses along the way, he found beers that were not only delicious, but that he'd never heard of before.

Gone are the days of watery, fizzy, tin cans of nothingness. Craft beer is rebellious, anti-establishment and witty. A good craft beer takes ingenuity and imagination to brew.

An army of thousands are tinkering and tweaking. Inventing, discovering and creating. Strong beers, fruity beers, hoppy beers, all for you to discover.

Free yourself from big beer brand slavery. Drink the freshest beer. Send your tastebuds on the ultimate craft beer road trip.

How it works:

  1. Each month, our experts pick the best beers personalised to the recipient
  2. We send 8 different exclusive craft beers and Ferment magazine
  3. The recipient gets access to the freshest beer available - in the glass within 4-6 weeks of being brewed

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 6 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 month chocolate tasting course
fields.description:
Know someone who considers themself a bit of an epicure? A chocolate gourmet? Or simply just can’t enough chocolate? Well we’ve created the perfect club for them.

As a member of the Cocoa Runners club they’ll receive a box of four carefully selected premium chocolate bars every month in their choice of either mixed or dark bars.

With each box we aim to broaden their experiences of chocolate, from exploring single origin beans, to comparing styles and flavour from different parts of the world, to unwrapping the stories behind our artisan makers – they’ll have plenty to look forward to.

They’ll also find tasting cards and expert reviews by our team to guide them along the way. What’s more exciting than receiving the finest chocolate from around the world straight to your doorstep?!

How it works:

  1. We run around the world to find you four new craft chocolate bars each month
  2. You taste chocolate from some of the world's most exclusive artisan chocolate makers
  3. Unwrap the stories behind each bar via our tasting notes. Then share your own notes online

Cocoa Runners is any chocolate lover's dream company.

The Sunday Times

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 5 Graze snack boxes
fields.description:
At graze we want to help people snack better and show them that it does not have to come at the sacrifice of quality or taste. We believe in mindful eating – actively thinking about what you are consuming and savoring the flavor and texture of foods so you feel more satisfied and eat only what you need.

With a graze subscription, you will gift access to all the newest snacks created by our taste experts and approved by our nutritionist. Help someone special discover a new favourite today!

Our snack boxes have no artificial colours, flavours or preservatives. Each portion is carefully controlled and has a nutritionist approved badge.

How it works:

  1. Your lucky recipient gets a voucher, which they can then redeem from our website and tell us where to send their box to
  2. The recipient gets to explore over 100 exciting snacks and tell us what he or she likes
  3. We hand-pick and deliver a box of 4 exciting snacks to their door

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 5 snack boxes along with a personalised message.

fields.name: Tasting Club 3 month subscription
fields.description:
Treat a friend or family member to a chocolate subscription from Hotel Chocolat's Tasting Club.

Receive a different box of exclusive new chocolate recipes every 4 weeks for 3 months. Our incredible subscription packs are sent out by post and allow the lucky recipient to become a Tasting Club Member.

When the pack arrives, just simply activate the membership online or by phone, and choose the perfect monthly boxes - Classic, Dark, Mellow, Fortified or Rare Cocoa - featuring exclusive recipes created for Tasting Club members only by Hotel Chocolats chocolatiers.

Members also have exclusive access to manage their boxes online, score every chocolate and order special edition collections.

How it works:

  1. Your lucky recipient chooses a Chocolate Club - Classic, Dark, Mellow, Fortified or Rare Cocoa
  2. We ask for a few details including delivery preferences
  3. We deliver the chocolates straight to their door for them to enjoy

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription along with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 month Colours & Flavours subscription - 2 bottles per month
fields.description:
Know someone who loves wine? My Vitibox will get them from beginner to connoisseur in no time. Each month, they will receive two bottles of wine carefully selected by Alain Gousse, the former Head Sommelier of Michelin starred restaurants la Tour d’Argent, le Crillon, le Pavillon de la Rotonde and le Hameau Albert 1er.

Accompanying the wine is a fun but educational booklet that walks them through how to taste each of the wines in the box, along with definitions of wine jargon to look out for and some recipe ideas to follow the key food and wine pairing rules. They can even receive small bottles of wine aromas to train their nose!

How it works:

  1. Your lucky recipient gets a voucher, which they can then use to subscribe on our website in a few clicks
  2. We deliver a wine box each month to the recipient's home
  3. The recipient has the option of purchasing his or her favourite wines at a 15% discount off the original price

The Colours & Flarours wine subscription provides the lucky recipient with two great wines to make the best food and wine pairings each month

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month wine subscription (mixed) along with a personalised message.

This Red Passion wine subscription provides the lucky recipient with one amazing red wine selected by Alain Gousse and Le Figaro each month

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 6 month wine subscription (red) along with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 month Red Passion subscription - 2 bottles per month
fields.description:
Know someone who loves wine? My Vitibox will get them from beginner to connoisseur in no time. Each month, they will receive two bottles of wine carefully selected by Alain Gousse, the former Head Sommelier of Michelin starred restaurants la Tour d’Argent, le Crillon, le Pavillon de la Rotonde and le Hameau Albert 1er.

Accompanying the wine is a fun but educational booklet that walks them through how to taste each of the wines in the box, along with definitions of wine jargon to look out for and some recipe ideas to follow the key food and wine pairing rules. They can even receive small bottles of wine aromas to train their nose!

How it works:

  1. Your lucky recipient gets a voucher, which they can then use to subscribe on our website in a few clicks
  2. We deliver a wine box each month to the recipient's home
  3. The recipient has the option of purchasing his or her favourite wines at a 15% discount off the original price

This Red Passion wine subscription provides the lucky recipient with two amazing red wines selected by Alain Gousse and Le Figaro each month

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month wine subscription (red) along with a personalised message.

fields.name: Taste of Bubbles - 3 month membership
fields.description:
Bubble Club subscription is the perfect gift for the sparkling wine lover in your life, whatever the occasion.

Each Bubble Box is always a complete surprise until arrives, but is guaranteed to be packed with two delicious bottles of sparkling wine, gourmet goodies and our glossy club magazine.

How it works:

  1. Upon purchase, we will email the recipient with a gift certificate
  2. Your recipient logs on to our webstie to claim their gift subscription
  3. Your gift keeps on giving, month after month

Our subscription provides new sparkling wines that you won't find in your local supermarket.

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription along with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 months of surprise presents
fields.description:
Know someone who has everything and is impossible to buy gifts for? Or simply want to say "I'm thinking of you" every month?

Gift a subscription for Not-Another-Bill and each month your lucky recipient will receive a carefully curated & beautifully wrapped surprise present in the post. As well as making letterboxes a more magical place, our aim is to introduce subscribers to exclusive items from great artists, designers and brands.

From our boxes, ribbons and beautiful tissue paper to the personalised letter explaining about the present, we really consider how the whole experience looks and feels.

How it works:

  1. We send a digital gift card to your lucky recipient
  2. Your recipient will get to select his preferences and style
  3. Each month, we'll send a surprise to suit

I have used your service for a friend, and she absolutely LOVED her gifts. It’s such a great idea, and I’m just hoping that, if I drop enough hints, someone will treat me to a subscription too!

Customer

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 month beauty box subscription
fields.description:
Know someone who is a lover of all things beauty? Each month GLOSSYBOX delivers 5 must-have beauty products straight to their door, perfectly packaged in our signature box.

The expert team at GLOSSYBOX carefully curates every beauty box, vetting each brand to the highest quality standards and ensuring every selection meets their beauty needs.

Inclusive of luxury, niche and emerging brands, GLOSSYBOX offers the best service in beauty discovery as well as the latest beauty tips and tricks for your lucky recipient to trial and test.

We have created a 360 experience that transcends beyond the box with expert beauty advice and features from some of the industry's finest on our online magazine, Beauty Unboxed.

Save your loved one hours of trawling the internet and department stores for the perfect perfume and that flawless foundation, we do the hard work so that they don’t have to.

How it works:

  1. A gift card subscription will be sent automatically to the recipient via email
  2. The recipient can activate their gift card subscription at any time
  3. Each month, we'll deliver 5 beauty products to give them their beauty fix in a gorgeous box

The leading beauty subscription service offers an ideal present for all occasions so whether you’re looking for a Christmas present, birthday present, Mother’s Day gift or even a Valentine’s Day surprise for someone special, GLOSSYBOX has you covered!

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.

fields.name: 3 months of Mini Japan Crate subscription
fields.description:
Send crazy and exlucisve Japanese candy monthly!

Your lucky recipient will get to try anything from Do-It-Yourself sushi kits to Vanilla Ice Cream Kit Kats. Our goal is to share the fun and unique experience of Japanese culture through candy.

We work directly with Japanese manufacturers and attend seasonal candy trade shows in Tokyo & Osaka to ensure that they receive the newest and most exclusive products available. We strive to send products that can only be found in Japan.

What they get exactly:

Mini Japan Crates include 0.5 pounds (~5 items) of crazy, full-size Japanese candy & snacks and a custom manga-zine with translations, contests and more in every shipment.

How it works:

  1. Buy a gift subscription for your lucky recipient
  2. Every month, our team handpicks a mystery assortment of Japanese candy and packs it into a crate
  3. We send over the crate and your recipient gets to indulge in the awesome goodies

With this purchase, we will send your selected recipient a digital gift card for a 3 month subscription with a personalised message.
